content.question: In the poem as a whole, the continuation of sentences over line breaks most clearly has the effect of

choices.label: suggesting the speakerâ€™s discontinuous and digressive train of thought
evoking the stitching together of fragmentary materials used for quiltwork
conveying the sense of excess that the speaker associates with quiltwork
reinforcing a contrast between poetry and quiltwork

content.answer: evoking the stitching together of fragmentary materials used for quiltwork

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
